Name: Ramalinga Reddy
Tweet: Sri Ramalinga Reddy along with Congress leaders and party workers campaigned for Smt. Sushma Rajagopal Reddy at Bommanahalli constituency.  Sushma Rajgopal Reddy is an extremely capable leader and she has been involved in social welfare activities for over 20 years. #Bommanahalli  https://t.co/5fS6H7fEVm
